DOC.brief_summary: From September 2006 prospective cohort study conduct among patient operate Leuven University Fertility Centre evaluate clinical economical outcome CO2 laser laparoscopic fertility surgery .
DOC.detailed_description: The main outcome measurement postoperative complication , pain , quality life , sexual satisfaction , economic life circumstance , cumulative pregnancy rate cumulative recurrence rate endometriosis .
